availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jasper Turner (Ballard County, Kentucky, farm laborer.)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Tennessee native. Son of John Turner and Nancy Turner. Resident of Wayne County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farm laborer in Ballard County, Kentucky, in 1860. Farmer in Ballard County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Wayne County, District 5, p. 312B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Picketts District, p. 622.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Ballard County, KY, June 1863, p. 43.
